text: Something the liberal media won’t acknowledge: @realDonaldTrump was able to draw 10,000 plus people to a rally in the middle of a global pandemic! That’s called dedication and passion so where exactly is the enthusiasm slip in 2020? Shockingly,the liberal Media is wrong again.
